business.headline: Amazon India hit with $39 million penalty for apparel trademark violationThe lawsuit was filed by Lifestyle Equities, the owner of the Beverly Hills Polo Club (BHPC) horse trademark. It claimed that Amazon India was selling apparel with a similar logo at lower prices.

Fixed vs floating interest rates: Which option to choose?Floating home loan interest rates are usually lower than fixed rates. Hence, they are more appealing when rates are likely to dip or stay stable.
Sensex, Nifty end flat despite banking and financial sector boostThe S&P BSE Sensex added 10.31 points to close at 74,612.43, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 2.50 points to end at 22,545.05.
Sensex, Nifty end flat despite banking and financial sector boostThe S&P BSE Sensex added 10.31 points to close at 74,612.43, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 2.50 points to end at 22,545.05.
Why NPS should be a part of your retirement plan? 5 things to knowWhen compared to fixed deposits (FDs) and Public Provident Funds (PPF), NPS offers superior returns over the long run.

Explained: Why NBFC stocks may offer stability in choppy marketsThe RBI's decision to ease certain loan rules and delay stricter regulations on capital requirements has improved sentiment in the financial sector. This has made NBFC stocks attractive options for investors.

Bitcoin sees 10% drop this week: 5 reasons behind the fallThe largest crypto has witnessed a decline of more than 10% over the last seven days. This downward trend comes amid US President Donald Trump's aggressive trade policies and EU tariff threats.

Government seeks to cut states' share of central taxes: ReportBased on the expected tax collections for the ongoing financial year, a 1% swing in the states' share of tax revenue could give the central government about Rs 3,500 crore.

Sensex, Nifty tumble 4% this month: Should share market investors be worried? Brokerage firm Emkay Global said falling prices make market investors nervous, but there are good signs too. The RBI lowering risk for NBFCs and micro-borrowers helps, and Nifty is now priced better at around 22,500.
Infosys trainees complain to PM's Office over 'forceful' layoffs: ReportThe employees have sought intervention to be reinstated in their jobs and to prevent similar terminations in the future.

Trump Gold Card Visa: 5 key things you need to knowUS President Donald Trump believes the new visa will attract wealthy individuals to the US who will spend large sums, pay high taxes, and boost the economy.

Explained: Why Nuvama cut Spicejet share price target despite profit in Q3SpiceJet attributed its Q3 performance to strong passenger demand, better efficiency, and smarter pricing. In the third quarter, the company's revenue jumped 35% to Rs 1,651 crore, and occupancy stayed at 87%.

entertainment.headline: Composer Pritam thanks Mumbai Police for arresting studio theft culpritMusic composer Pritam expressed gratitude towards the Mumbai Police for capturing the suspect involved in a Rs 40 lakh theft from his studio. He praised their efforts in a heartfelt Instagram post.

The Boys 5: Supernatural actors Jensen Ackles, Jared Padalecki to reuniteThe Boys Season 5 will be an exciting reunion as Soldier Boy Jensen Ackles will be joined by his Supernatural co-stars Jared Padalecki and Misha Collins.

Suits LA review: Sass, swag and secrets in a soggy spin-offReleased-Mon Feb 24, 2025'Suits LA' has the flavour of the original 'Suits', but Teddy Black is no Harvey Spector, and you will be reminded of it, despite all the pizazz in the show.

Oscar-nominated Savan Kotecha to find India's first global boy bandSavan Kotecha is launching a nationwide hunt for India's first global boy band. Partnering with Universal Music, he aims to build a teen pop economy and create Indian stars for the world stage.

Undercover High School review: Korean 'Main Hoon Na' with more thrillsReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025Undercover High School review: It is a thrilling Korean series blending action and comedy, reminiscent of 'Main Hoon Na', where a disgraced spy navigates high school challenges while on a mission to find missing gold.

O Saathi Re: Imtiaz Ali's Netflix series is a modern story with a vintage heartNetflix has released the first look of its new series O Saathi Re, starring Avinash Tiwary, Aditi Rao Hydari, and Arjun Rampal. The series, directed by Arif Ali, will be an 'ode to vintage love in modern times'.

Prajakta Koli hilariously dances to 'Mere Husband Mujhko Piyar…' at sangeet. WatchPrajakta Koli danced to Mere Husband Mujhko Piyar Nahin Karte at her sangeet, leaving guests in splits. She married Vrishank Khanal in Karjat on February 25.

Vijay Yesudas reacts to fake news about father Yesudas's hospitalisationReports were rife that playback singer Yesudas was hospitalised in Chennai due to age-related illness. His son and playback singer Vijay Yesudas exclusively spoke to India Today and shut down the rumours.

Sex Education actor Alexander Westwood jailed for 15 years for sex offencesSex Education actor Alexander Westwood received a 15-year prison sentence for multiple sex offenses. The case has captured widespread media attention due to Westwood's role in the popular Netflix show.

Aashram 3 Part 1 ending explained: Will Pammi's revenge end Baba Nirala's reign?With Aashram Season 3 Part 2 releasing on February 27, let us take a look at how the season ended on a cliffhanger with Baba Nirala's misuse of power and a change in dynamics.

Amit Trivedi says Jasleen Royal's opening act for Coldplay was 'unfortunate'Amit Trivedi, in an interview with India Today Digital, discussed the controversy over Jasleen Royal's opening act for Coldplay's India tour and whether it would impact on the image of Indian artists.

Rapper Kanye West trying to save marriage with Bianca Censori: ReportKanye West is reportedly trying to prevent his marriage with Bianca Censori from ending. An insider reveals that Bianca is considering divorce, and Kanye is panicking.

Singer Palash Sen on working with Akshay Kumar, not being 'accepted' by BollywoodEuphoria's lead vocalist Palash Sen spoke to India Today Digital about collaborating with Bollywood star Akshay Kumar on the song Mahakal Chalo, work opportunities in the Hindi film industry, and more in an exclusive interaction.

Actors Aman Verma and Vandana Lalwani to separate after 9 years of marriageActors Aman Verma and Vandana Lalvani are separating after nine-years of marriage. Amid growing speculation, Aman has addressed the rumours about their relationship.

Baalveer actor Dev Joshi marries girlfriend Aarti, first pics outBaalveer actor Dev Joshi married his girlfriend Aarti in a beautiful ceremony. The wedding festivities, including haldi and mehndi, were spectacular and captured in stunning photos.

Be Happy: Abhishek Bachchan, Inayat Verma series to stream in MarchThe streaming date of Abhishek Bachchan and Inayat Verma-starrer Be Happy is out. It promises to be a touching film about a single father's journey to support his daughter's dream of performing on a dance reality show.

A Man on the Inside: Ted Danson's charming comedy deserves more loveA Man on the Inside is a warm and witty series which tackles multiple subjects, including loss, new beginnings and, well, crime. The Ted Danson-starrer is currently streaming on Netflix.

Shreya Ghoshal on Chikni Chameli: Embarrassed when 5-year-old girls sing itShreya Ghoshal says she feels embarrassed when young girls sing Chikni Chameli, stressing that lyrics should be written more thoughtfully, as music and films have a deep impact on society.

Hina Khan updates fans about cancer treatment: My chemo and surgery are overHina Khan recently gave an update about her cancer treatment. The actor mentioned that her chemotherapy and surgery are over.

Tanmay Bhat jokes about Ranveer Allahbadia ignoring his textsTanmay Bhat hilariously addressed the India's Got Latent controversy, joking about Ranveer Allahbadia ignoring his texts. The reaction video left fellow comedians laughing and also "triggered" them.

Singer Udit Narayan visits Maha Kumbh Mela with wife, expresses gratitude Singer Udit Narayan was among the latest celebrities to visit the holy city of Prayagraj for Maha Kumbh 2025. In an interview with ANI, he expressed his gratitude and congratulated Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath for the well-organised and efficient arrangements.

My Dearest Nemesis review: Chaotic chemistry makes even familiar trope workMy Dearest Nemesis features K-drama stars Moon Ga young and Choi Hyun-wook in the lead. It is available to stream on Viki. Here's our take on the romantic drama.

Internet calls Farah Khan 'insensitive' for mocking Gaurav Khanna's colour blindnessCelebrity MasterChef judge Farah Khan mocked TV actor Gaurav Khanna's colour blindness on the show. Following the same, the internet is outraged by her comments, criticising the filmmaker and calling her 'insensitive'.

Parineeti Chopra gears up for her first Netflix yet-to-be-titled thriller seriesActor Parineeti Chopra is set to make her series OTT debut with a Netflix project. The actor shared a post and informed about sharing screen space with Nimrit Kaur, Soni Razdan, and others.

Tanmay Bhat's X account hacked, comedian warns followersTanmay Bhat's X account recently got hacked, leading to fraudulent messages being posted online. The comedian shared a post on his Instagram and warned his followers.

Prajakta Koli-Vrishank Khanal can't take their eyes off each other in haldi picsActor Prajakta Koli is set to marry longtime boyfriend Vrishank Khanan on February 25. Ahead of the grand day, the actor shared pictures from her haldi function.

Anupam Mittal on India's Got Latent backlash: Not a lost episode of Satyamev JayateAnupam Mittal weighs in on the India's Got Latent row, arguing that YouTube should also be held accountable. He calls Big Tech the real culprit, criticising digital platforms for fueling outrage-driven content.

Bobby Deol says Aashram helped him break industry image, explore new rolesActor Bobby Deol is all set to return as Baba Nirala in Prakash Jha's series, Aashram 3 part 2. The actor confessed that he wanted to step out of his comfort zone.

Waking of Nation trailer: Taaruk Raina fights to prove Jallianwala Bagh was plannedA new show that explores the events surrounding the Jallianwala Bagh massacre is set to premiere on Sony LIV on March 8. Starring Taaruk Raina in the lead role, the series is titled The Waking of a Nation.
Singer Justin Bieber responds to rumours of drug useJustin Bieber's representative has reacted to the reports of the singer's drug use and called them false.

Ranveer Allahbadia runs to car after recording statement in Latent probeRanveer Allahbadia was clicked in a hurried state, running towards his car as the paparazzi tried to capture his pictures on Monday. The YouTuber visited the Maharashtra Cyber office in Mahape after recording his statement.

Kaushaljis vs Kaushal review: A simple yet complex tale of second chance in loveReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025Kaushaljis vs Kaushal movie review: This film is a heartfelt exploration of second chances in love, focusing on a middle-aged couple navigating the complexities of separation and familial expectations. Set in the relatable backdrop of Kannauj, the film captivates with its simplicity and stellar performances.

Dupahiya trailer: A wedding, a missing bike and a lot of chaos in offingThe first full trailer of Prime Video's upcoming comedy series, Dupahiya, is here. The show will feature actors such as Sparsh Shrivastava and Gajraj Rao in pivotal roles.

Bride-to-Be Prajakta Koli dances to Zingaat with fiance at mehndi ceremony. WatchPrajakta Koli shared glimpses of her mehndi ceremony as she danced joyfully with fiance Vrishank Khanal. The couple is set to marry on February 25.

Zero Day review: Star power can't save this weakly executed political dramaReleased-Thu Feb 20, 2025Zero Day, directed by Lesli Linka Glatter, is a political drama featuring a stellar cast including Robert De Niro and Angela Bassett. While the performances are strong, the series struggles with plot depth and resolution.

Watch: Jennie and Doechii bring the heat with ExtraL ahead of RubyJennie and Doechii are making waves with their latest collaboration, ExtraL. As Jennie gears up for her solo debut with the album Ruby, fans can expect a bold new chapter in her musical journey.

Complaint against Munawar Faruqui for 'insulting religion' on Hafta Vasooli showComedian Munawar Faruqui landed in legal trouble after a complaint was filed against him for hurting religious sentiments through his show, Hafta Vasooli. The advocate shared a copy of the complaint on X.

'Mismatched' actor Prajakta Koli shares dreamy pics from her mehndiContent creator and actor Prajakta Koli has started her pre-wedding celebrations with a vibrant mehndi ceremony. She shared joyful moments with her fiance Vrishank Khanal and family on social media.

Honey Singh's Millionaire concert in Mumbai showed what grand comebacks look likeYo Yo Honey Singh made a powerful return to the stage in Mumbai, captivating fans with his energy and heartfelt messages. His performance was a testament to his resilience and dedication to the art.

Samay Raina recalls what he asked Tanmay Bhat after India's Got Latent controversyComedian Samay Raina addresses the controversy surrounding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's inappropriate remark on his show, India's Got Latent, during his tour in Canada. He recalled what he had asked Tanmay Bhat after the controversy erupted.

general news.headline: 10 hurt as car rams people in Israel, assailant shot dead; terror attack suspectedReports from Israeli media indicate that two police officers were also stabbed at the Karkur intersection during the attack. The assailant was shot and killed by police at the scene.

Key Meitei group surrenders 246 weapons in Manipur on last day of deadlineArambai Tenggol, a key Meitei group in Manipur, surrendered 246 weapons as the state's seven-day deadline to return illegal and looted arms and ammunition is set to end today.

Visa office asked us to leave: Father of Indian student battling for life in USNeelam Shinde, a student from Maharashtra's Satara district, is currently battling for life in a US hospital after an accident on February 14.

Instagram floods users with sex, rape, murder Reels; Meta says 'error' fixedInstagram users reported being flooded with graphic content on rape, sex and violence on February 26. Meta has admitted to it and says the 'error' has been fixed. Something very similar happened on February 26, 2023, too. This is all we know about the latest flood of gore on Instagram.

Meet Faryal Waqar: The viral Pakistani cricket fan who admires Virat Kohli In an exclusive interview with India Today, Faryal Waqar opened up about the whirlwind of attention she has received over the past few days after a video of her reaction to the India vs Pakistan game in Dubai went viral. Faryal, a fan of Mohammad Rizwan and Virat Kohli, bore a striking resemblance to Bollywood star Deepika Padukone.

DY Chandrachud recalls Nirbhaya case: 'Implementing laws for women important'Proper implementation of laws made for women is required to prevent incidents of sexual harassment, the former CJI said, adding a lot of changes were made in laws following the Nirbhaya incident in Delhi.

Idli-sambar sale on beach shacks behind decline in international tourists: Goa MLAThe BJP legislator, however, did not elaborate on how the popular South Indian breakfast dish is affecting tourism in his state.

Why Nitish Kumar's all-BJP cabinet induction signals a power rejig in BiharFor junior ally JD(U), it is a tactical concession for a bigger quid pro quo—perhaps a larger share of seats to contest in the assembly polls

Seven planets visible in the sky: It won't happen again for over a decadeThe planets — Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune — will appear in a curved line across the sky, known as the ecliptic, which is the path the Sun traces.

Plastic use banned in making of idlis after minister flags carcinogenic elementsThe Karnataka government cracked down on the usage of plastic sheets in preparation of idlis in the states. The ban on use of plastic was issued after 52 hotels in the state were found to be using polythene sheets to make idlis, Health Minister Dinesh Gundu Rao said.

Amazon India hit with $39 million penalty for apparel trademark violationThe lawsuit was filed by Lifestyle Equities, the owner of the Beverly Hills Polo Club (BHPC) horse trademark. It claimed that Amazon India was selling apparel with a similar logo at lower prices.

No Class 10 certificate without Punjabi? Punjab vs CBSE controversy explainedThe Punjab government has taken a firm stand on making Punjabi a mandatory subject for passing Class 10 from any board, intensifying its rift with the Centre. The controversy erupted after CBSE's draft policy for the 2025-26 Class 10 board exams omitted Punjabi from the list of regional languages, sparking political outrage.

Pakistani woman's 'divorced, desi, thriving' dance video comes with a powerful messageA text overlay on the viral video read: "You found the perfect song to dance to as a recently divorced Pakistani mother of three."

MK Stalin vs Amit Shah: Who is speaking the truth on delimitation?The Tamil Nadu CM fears delimitation will dilute the South's Lok Sabha seat share and voice in national decision-making. The BJP dismisses his concern as fear-mongering

Siddaramaiah slams Amit Shah's delimitation claims, calls them untrustworthyKarnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah warned that the Centre's delimitation plan could severely reduce southern states' representation. He called for fairness, unity, and a coordinated fight against political marginalisation.

US to offer citizenship route for $5 million. Does India have own Gold Card visa?US President Donald Trump has announced a Gold Card, a visa for those willing to invest $5 million. The US might scrap the EB-5, which needed an investment of $1 million and the pledge to create 10 jobs. Does India, which looks to attract foreign investors, have something similar to Trump's Gold Card?

Video: Mother protects child from brutal Rottweiler attack as blood stains the snowIn the video, the woman is seen shielding her child lying on the snowy path, while the Rottweiler looms nearby, poised to attack again.

Rajasthan's Beawar tense after charges of sexual exploitation of schoolgirlsCommunal tension has gripped areas of Rajasthan's Beawar after charges that several schoolgirls were sexually exploited and blackmailed, and attempts were made at religious conversion. Markets were shut down in several areas and rallies taken out, demanding justice. Police have detained 11 accused.

Sri Sri Ravi Shankar on Kumbh water row: Ganga doesn't allow bacterial growthSpiritual leader Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, in an exclusive interview with India Today, said the Maha Kumbh, which ended on Wednesday, showcased the rich diversity and the spiritual wealth of India.

Union Minister bats for fair compensation to media houses by digital platformsUnion Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw, speaking at the Storyboard18 DNPA Conclave, said the government was working towards ensuring fair compensation for traditional media houses.
Salman Khan unleashes action in explosive Sikandar teaserSalman Khan's new Sikandar teaser is out. It promises high-octane action. Directed by AR Murugadoss, the film also stars Rashmika Mandanna.

As Rahul Gandhi skips Maha Kumbh visit, BJP finds stick to beat Congress withWhile Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde slammed Rahul Gandhi and Uddhav Thackeray for calling themselves 'Hindutvavadis', the Congress said politics should not be done over Kumbh.
Bengaluru techie compares work culture in India and the UK after moving to LondonReflecting on his experiences, Arnav Gupta observed a stark contrast in the work culture between India and the UK.

Nephew Abhishek Banerjee rejects rift rumours with Mamata Banerjee: I am loyalTMC leader Abhishek Banerjee dismissed rift rumours with Mamata Banerjee, reaffirming his loyalty while warning against internal conspiracies and indiscipline within the party.

Read Ayushmann Khurrana's letter to his younger self who 'dared to dream'Bollywood star Ayushmann Khurrana shared a sweet and touching letter to his younger self as his acclaimed movie, Dum Laga Ke Haisha, turned 10. The movie also starred Bhumi Pednekar.

Abhishek Banerjee, Shahana Goswami, Neeraj Kabi lead Bharat Bala's 'Mahasangam''Mahasangam', directed by Bharat Bala, features Abhishek Banerjee, Shahana Goswami, and Neeraj Kabi in a story set against the Maha Kumbh festival. It explores the dynamics of a musical inheritance within a family.

Zoya Akhtar and her team on bringing magic of cinema with 'Superboys of Malegaon'Filmmaker Zoya Akhtar and Reema Kagti talk about bringing 'Superboys of Malegaon', their latest film about the joy of filmmaking and making dreams come true, irrespective of the sources. The team of the film, including actors Vineet Kumar Singh, Adarsh Gourav and Shashank Arora, explain why this is a beautiful attempt at making honest cinema. While Ritesh Sidhwani talks about finding the real parameters for success when box office numbers tell a pretty lopsided story, director Kagti breaks down a prominent scene from the film.

Actor Shiva Rajkumar joins Ram Charan's film, reveals working during chemotherapyKannada superstar Shiva Rajkumar, who recently returned home after receiving treatment and successfully overcoming cancer in Florida, USA, shared in an interview the challenges he faced while shooting films during chemotherapy.

sports.headline: Afghanistan vs Australia, all you need to know: Lahore pitch report, live streamingAfghanistan and Australia will face-off in one of the most anticipated fixtures of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 on Friday, February 28 at Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore. The winner of the fixture will qualify for the semi-finals of the tournament.

Champions Trophy: Which is the 2nd best ODI team in Asia?Two Asian teams - Bangladesh and Pakistan, have already been knocked out of the Champions Trophy 2025. Are the Asian ODI teams in decline? If India is the best ODI team in the continent, who is the second best? Kingshuk and Rishabh discuss in the Clash of Champions.

Asia Cup 2025 in September, likely to be played at a neutral venue in T20 formatThe 17th edition of the Asia Cup is likely to be played in T20 format. UAE is set to host the tournament as the Asian Cricket Council is keen on picking a neutral venue for the continental tournament.

Australia are wary of Afghanistan's spin and pace threat: Marnus LabuschagneAustralia batter Marnus Labuschagne acknowledged Afghanistan's threat in all three departments and said that their batters will especially work on negating their spinners in the middle overs. Australia will take on Afghanistan in their last group game of the Champions Trophy on Friday, February 28.

Meet Faryal Waqar: The viral Pakistani cricket fan who admires Virat Kohli In an exclusive interview with India Today, Faryal Waqar opened up about the whirlwind of attention she has received over the past few days after a video of her reaction to the India vs Pakistan game in Dubai went viral. Faryal, a fan of Mohammad Rizwan and Virat Kohli, bore a striking resemblance to Bollywood star Deepika Padukone.

Privilege to be compared to Deepika Padukone, says viral Pakistani cricket fanChampions Trophy 2025: It wasn't just her reaction that caught everyone's attention. Several cricket fans on social media pointed out that Faryal Waqar resembled Bollywood actors of the likes of Deepika Padukone and Kriti Sanon.

Jasprit Bumrah starts bowling at NCA, posts training videoIndia pacer Jasprit Bumrah began bowling at the National Cricket Academy in Bengaluru. Bumrah has not played any form of cricket since Border-Gavaskar Trophy 2024/25.

Gavaskar takes a dig at Harry Brook after England's exit: Are lights in Lahore ok?Legendary India cricketer Sunil Gavaskar took a dig at Harry Brook following England's exit from the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 after their defeat to Afghanistan in Lahore.

IND vs PAK bilateral cricket only resume under one condition: GavaskarIndia and Pakistan cannot play bilateral series without solving border issues, said Sunil Gavaskar. Speaking on Pakistani YouTube channel Sports Central, Gavaskar candidly shared his views on the sensitive matter.

Gutted Mohammad Rizwan not looking for excuses after Champions Trophy exitPakistan Captain Mohammad Rizwan said that he's not looking for any excuses after his team's early exit from the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. Their last game against Bangladesh go washed out in Rawalpindi due to incessant rain.

Ranji Trophy final, VID vs KER: Aditya Sarwate leads Kerala's fightback on Day 2Aditya Sarwate led Kerala's brilliant fightback on Day 2 as they ended the day on 131 for 3 in 39 overs. Vidharbha's innings came to an end at 379 after some late fireworks from the lower order.

Ranji Trophy final, VID vs KER: Aditya Sarwate leads Kerala's fightback on Day 2Aditya Sarwate led Kerala's brilliant fightback on Day 2 as they ended the day on 131 for 3 in 39 overs. Vidharbha's innings came to an end at 379 after some late fireworks from the lower order.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
